name: Curse Removal Service
description:
You start working as a curse remover.  Remember to notify the patient after the curse is lifted, I'm sure she will read it :)

Controls:

Space - Move forward

Ctrl - Jump

Arrow Keys - Look Around

P - Drop curse

This game was made as part of Latinx in Gaming: Unidos Online Jam 2021

CW: Trans-struggles, depression, some strong colors

Everything by virago_k
